Text:
Just to note that you will need to download a directshow FFshow codec for some of the files to play. This is a reseed of different torrents.

Try either of these links

http://www.free-codecs.com/
http://sourceforge.net/projects/ffdshow

Install codecs and reboot
Could someone please reseed this? It would be greatly appreciated :)

after hours of frustration I finally got the videos to play.  If you have the same problem try http://www.free-codecs.com/download/K_Lite_Mega_Codec_Pack.htm - after installing I had to enable the mpeg 2 ffdshow codec as it was disabled by default.  
Thanks for the upload nospammersplease.
